main_definition: The act of paying attention to sounds with the intention of understanding or interpreting their meaning.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The ability to perceive sound by detecting vibrations through one's ears
meanings_and_examples.example: When she heard the faint music, her exceptional listening skills allowed her to identify each instrument.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Giving full attention to a person who is speaking or communicating
meanings_and_examples.example: He was known for his great listening skills; when someone talked to him, he always made them feel heard and understood.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Paying careful attention while hearing something
meanings_and_examples.example: While listening to the lecture, she took notes to ensure that she fully grasped all of the information presented.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Engaging in an activity focused on processing and understanding audio content
meanings_and_examples.example: The podcast episode was dedicated to discussing various interpretations and analyses related to a specific topic, encouraging active listening from its audience.
